alert.note: Alert for Saratoga; Warren (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 20 at 2:22AM EST until December 20 at 9:30AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Hudson River at Hadley. * WHEN...Until late this morning. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, Water reaches minor flood stage and overflows into low lying areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:00 AM EST Wednesday the stage was 14.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage early this morning and continue falling to 8.0 feet early Friday afternoon. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Hudson River Hadley Flood Stage: 14.0 Observed Stage at Wed 2 am: 14.2 Forecast: Wed 7 am 13.5 Wed 1 pm 12.9 Wed 7 pm 12.2 Thu 1 am 11.5 Thu 7 am 10.7 Thu 1 pm 10.0 Thu 7 pm 9.5 Fri 1 am 9.0 Fri 7 am 8.5 Fri 1 pm 8.0 Fri 7 pm MSG &&
